title: Japan Bond Crash Unleashes a $7 Trillion Risk for Global Markets
description: As the country hurtles towards the snap election called by Prime Minister Takaichi, more unpredictable and violent price swings are expected
content: As the country hurtles towards the snap election called by Prime Minister Takaichi, more unpredictable and violent price swings are expected
